review: a hidden gem for sure  bought years ago but played  lately its a great adventure great story characters and atmosphere  after you get introduced to characters chapter after chapter you build a connection  controls are clunky but space bar showing interaction points help   for technical issues with modern systems please check guides here also some resolutions make inventory unusable   wish they make more adventures games like this jane jensen is a master story teller
unique story line and game play with the fun mash up between magicians and the paranormal beautiful imagery
as good as the longest journey a true classic point and click adventure
game does not start
a great point  click game i got stuck a few times but i managed a lil bit on the depressing side though
i love this game i wish they would remaster it or do another part
great story and riddles good ending beautiful paintings lots of england and good music a jam for point  click adventure lovers
i really like angela so lovely
great game with intriguing magic related puzzles and a cleaver story

i only found out about jane jensen after this game in fact never knew who that person was apparently she was the staple of the point and click adventure genre regardless i was very impressed by this game the ending isnt so great but the build up is amazing keeps you intrigued keeps you playing keeps you yearning to find out whats gonna happen next

this game was great a really enjoyed it the art work is amazing i wouldve loved to see the next game sadly the company went out of business if anyone owns the ip get jan jensen back and create the pride of frankenstein will u thank you

a great wellwritten point  click adventure game from the creator of gabriel knight there are some really cool plot points and twists and turns that are well hidden even in hindsight and i could easily see there being a sequel to this at some point in the future one note if you are buying the game now you may have to download some additional drivers to help you play it as the software is built for older computers
a good old classic

if you love classic point  click adventures you will most likely enjoy this game as a fan of games like broken sword syberia grim fandango etc i absolutely loved this game the voice acting and dialogue was superb  witty endearing and it made me really like the characters storyline was super intriguing as well took me about 9 hours to 100 the game would 1010 recommend to fans of this genre
very excited story i enjoyed it so much

i cant believe i never heard of this game until recently its one of the best games i have played in the last 10 years the story is addicting the writing is superb and the clues are a challenge but not discouraging for anyone looking for a good adventure game mixed with suspense this is your game i only wish there was a sequel or a series of this game so good

officially one of if not my favorite games 1010 would recommend especially if you are a fan of other point of click game story is interesting along with the characters really got me invested to the end

i wish i could blame the dodgy mechanics the bad animation and the total luck of it in cutscenes but no it was the awful writing the totally uninteresting almost ridiculous main story the horribly written characters that look like they jumped from a horrible netflix teen series sorry jane but you totally lost it
chapter 2 is bugged
i gave up theres trigger issues so i cant even get through the first scene  clicked every interactable and the first person youre supposed to meet mrs dalton the housekeeper never shows up
unbearably slowpaced dull and boring
the game starts off slow but gradually very gradually picks up and develops into a very intriguing mystery i would recommend it to anyone who enjoys a good whodunit

this was a super fun game with an interesting story a unique twist with the magician angle and fun puzzles to solve it was challenging without being too over the top i really loved the main character and the first time i played i was completely drawn in by the mystery and possible paranormal aspects overall its a very well done game

this is quite a mixed bag the writing here is excellent if a very slow burn the magic tricks slant is somewhat refreshing for the genre but nonmagic puzzles are very lacking borderline hidden object game level at times this isnt going to be for everyone  but if you know what youre in for it can be a good time

this is a great game the story the puzzles the atmosphere i would definitely never have made it through without consulting the walkthrough but the challenge made it fun the magic tricks got tedious and it would have been nice if there hadnt been quite so many americanisms in the dialogue
i love a game with a good story and riddles
this game has a good story challenging puzzles and beautiful graphics  love it
really interesting story enjoyable to play through jane jensen is great
great game the animations are probably a little dated but really enjoyed the story

great game i was a huge fan of the original gabriel knight from the same designer back in the early 90s and via the more recent remake this has shades of that classic  i wouldnt say its quite up there but if you like gk i think youll like this too
good story good puzzles
magic psi ghosts detective work interesting and satisfyingly solvable puzzles mystery atmosphere all yes nice underrated gem of a game

i absolutley adore this game its a mature storyline with puzzles that can make your brain hurt at times its obviously not the holy grail in terms of story writing but still very dear to me even though i didnt like most cutscenes because of how dragged out they were they are visually very nice to look at voice acting is superb and in some strange way this has become a total comfort game for me very cozy for sure recommend playing on a cold fall day
music and graphics are amazing the story is entertaining and the quests are creative and enjoyable
noice
the first adventure game i played and the most memorable one
its ok

why did they make some of the david artwork really fucking hot at some parts im in pain dont do this to me im a simple man and simp 1110 would play it again for dr depression sadness no wait his name is dr david styles

the best thing the amazing pre rendered backgrounds and the use of reallife locations  the worst thing the ending which was rushed its like we spent the majority of the game on other things that were not connected to the ending then it finished and felt unexplained  the gameplay fun i love this style  the characters a bit cringy maybe  enjoyed it though want more
very good adventure
never have experienced a storyline like this very original

this game is really good one of the best point and click adventures beside the secret files series ive played so far  the story is really interesting with an upside down effect you cant be sure what really is going to happen in the end the way you learn lots of stuff about neurobiology and performing magic  the soundtrack is also really good i would recommend this game to gamers who love to solve riddles and decypher a interesting story

sorry but no clunky controls silly abstruse story with paranormal stuff not my cup of tea and i really enjoy good pointclicks many times its unclear how to proceed which is not due to no clues but just due to the storyline and motives of the characters being blurry pretty bad performance and optimization cant say i got to like any character of the two main ones dr styles is just an unlikable ass her  shes ok  nope sorry no pushed through but didnt enjoy
a good way to get started with magic tricks
great puzzles

unfortunately the game is unplayable  i would suggest not purchasing if you have windows 10  attempted and failed to get support from steam steam community or encorebroderbund   its a shame  i really wanted to play it too late to get a refund unfortunately

i really enjoyed this game i originally started playing it on disc remember what those are but it broke on chapter 6 and i couldnt progress the game so i ended up getting it on steam  im glad i did its a top point and click adventure although there are some parts where you just cant find what youre supposed to do next and that gets frustrating  the game isnt difficult at all and the graphics are good a nice laid back relaxing sunday game  overall 45
fun
super interesting and well constructed puzzles great example of the pointclick genre
great game fantastic graphics loved the magic trick puzzles sold story hope for a sequel
nice story line not to heavy upbeat trusting sort of dialogue very pleasant to play
good adventure quite similar to the gabriel knight series by the same author story is well developed pretty well voiced and acted game has just the right length and difficulty
really enjoyed this game  well told and interesting story

whilst the gameplay can at times be a little trying multiple clicks and the puzzles positively mind bending the story and characters are superbly atmospheric and immersive and the visuals are superbly done   whilst the music is a joy in its own right  highly recommended to anyone who likes gabriel knight
very good game makes you think puzzles  recommend
beautiful and cozy environments partially from realworld oxford characters that you can really relate to both the female and male ones
i preferred mobius empire rising but this shows why jane jensen is one of the best writers in the gaming world
an excellent adventure games with logical puzzles original plot and realistic characters

while this game can be clunky and buggy on occasion as is not uncommon in pointandclicks there are heaps of puzzles the solve and the mystery the game takes you on has a really interesting and satisfying ending in my opinion sams bubbly narration tempers the gloomy haunting setting of the game and by the end of the game i was wishing i could see more of her and of dr styles
i like point and click game and this one is not bad
jane jensen is one of the best game writers all who love gabriel knight series will like this game as well i really want a sequel though

the last great game by the lovely jane jensen a wonderfulwonderful story with characters you just dont want to part with when all is said and done accompanied by fantastic soundtrack by robert holmes and his daughter   realizing that i wont be able to spend any more time with samantha and learn when else shes capable of having up her sleeve brings me nothing but tears
i really love this game if you like gabriel knight series i believe youll like this one great atmosphere jane jensen in form and by the way jane can you make some more games damn it
love the graphics

excellent game holds up very well graphic and gameplay wise wish there was cloud saving and achievements but oh well  edit just finished it expect few bugs like cinematic playing the second time  which can be skipped fortunately and sometimes when starging the game i had really bad fps but its solved by rebooting pc its some memory leak or something i dont know  all in all great game sam is one of the coolest and lovable characters in adventure games too bad there is no sequel

brightened eyes my secrets lie not far away his medals and his badges are all dull by day many have i an answered plea my general now ill often see he comes at dawn out on the lawn in quiet steps with darkened eyes and wounds that bled have pillow for his weary head he lays his body down to rest among the dogs and gathered nest because hes safe in arms now what luck have i that i should see
a great adventure game perhaps not quite as good as the original gabriel knight but very good in its own right
really enjoyed the story and the characters although i expected a different ending it was entertaining i wish there was a sequel
good game for fans of jane jensen and gabriel knight series old school adventure music by robert holmes is great as usual the story keeps you interested all the way to the end
telekomunikacja polska sa  in oxford thats interesting
bit of a girly melodrama but i did like the weird science stuff standard usual point  click adventure gameplay with some nice art style and competent voice acting

the story is just so interesting that it keeps me wanting for more very mysterious and engaging the puzzles arent all that easy and i love it for that i personally like my puzzles to be harder to solve i was roped into this adventure from the beginning till the end i kept playing it i couldnt stay away from it im really glad i found this hidden gem when i finish the game i was left feeling wanting for more more of this adventure
very nice one

great game i love point and click games over all other genres this has good story voice acting and controls only problem i had is when my computer is left on for a few days the game runs slow only way to fix it is to restart the computer
good quality adventure game with interesting twists  the ability to do magic tricks probably helps
very interesting and unusual story  keeps you guessing most of the way  as an old school pointandclick adventure game fan i thoroughly enjoyed this game and had trouble ever walking away
solid point  click game with logical puzzles nice flow and decent visual style and sound design i also enjoyed the story so i can definitely recommend this for the adventure game genre lovers
i really love this game and  this story it would be nice to play the sequel of the wonderful game i thank jane jensen and team of developers the game

one of my favourite point and click games   i think the length of the game was good not to short but just right the puzzles could be challenging at times but for the most part they werent to bad just a matter of trying everything  i highly recommend this game

its from the writer of gabriel knight and has an intriguing story lots of false leads and areas for it to go reasonable adventure game play and puzzles are not crazy its ten bucks when i wrote this review and does not appear to go on sale so just it if it is in your wheelhouse

with the exception of a few bugs that are quite easily resolvable  especially with the assistance of the helpful steam community  this is a fantastically immersive story the depth of which is difficult to find i really enjoyed it

very good game dont mind my play hours finished it offline  story is interesting and compelling  i do have 1 complaint and that is that there are a few 2 or so really unintuitive puzzles that make no sense according to what i understand of the world but ok  besides that a really nice good adventure game
loved the story and characters

gray matter is an oldschool point and click adventure from the maker of the gabriel knight series  it hooked me right from the start and i played until i finished it with very little in the way of breaks  the characters are highly relatable and the storyline compelling  the only reason i didnt go right back in to play it again was i wanted to make sure i have forgotten as much of the gameplay as possible hopefully letting me enjoy it as much the second time through
really nice adventure game the playtime is a little short but the game was pretty interesting all the way through for fans of pointandclick adventures this game is worth its price
terrible way too slow boring and super illogical game
my friend gave me a game  as a gift i love mystery ones i played i love it how ever made it you did a great job xd xd xd xd
pretty good game beautiful visuals very interring magic tricks addition to gameplay and interesting story

this is my 1st or second favorite pointandclick adventure game it mixes themes like magic neurology and psychology very atmospheric great story gives the impression that it will have a part 2 but no part 2 was released and i played this game around 8 years ago   i installed it and it works terribly slow and seems buggy what a huge shame god thing that i only bought it to support the developer  prod but will definitely be a turnoff for other people

just finished this beautiful adventure point and click game i have always loved adventure games staring playing sierra games back in the days this game was a result of jane jensen who made gabriel knight for sierra back in 93 the music is lovely the characters in the game are really well designed the scenery is colorful and lovely i really enjoyed this game brings me back to the old days recommended
this game has aged well  beautifull enviroment well written characters and for the most part very well written plot one of the best pc adventures ive played
really nice game with an interesting story line the atmosphere is mystical and the magic tricks are adding an additional element of fun i thoroughly enjoyed playing it
gray matter has reminded me why i love point and click games  this is a relaxing gameplay experience with a narrative that even intrigued my nongamer friends  jane jensen bless your soul 3
very fun adventure game with a great story  atmosphere and awesome characters
its an amazing adventure game for its time rich story and the touch of magic tricks throughout the gameplay is defenitely a plus for me definitely give it a try if you are a fan of the supernatural
fairly standard point and click gameplay but with a very interesting story
so whens the sequel coming out again

its good it starts a little weird yes but it quickly becomes very interesting the music is so good that it stays with you even when youre not playing also very nice atmosphere great voice actors for the main characters and good enough voice work for the others but the games greatest achievement is how the story progresses and evolves as you play
game play is enjoyable music is stunning art and visuals very appealing the game may not be that long but it is worth a play
i think gray matter has three main positive aspects rather interesting story splendid idea with tricks and perfect music game length is ok nothing really impressive but good enough for adventure fans
one of the better point n click games ive pick up on steam good story and voice acting

its a fairly basic pc game that doesnt have the best graphics animations or cut scenes but i enjoyed the gameplay and story a lot i found the puzzles to be logical and enjoyable and i didnt need a walkthrough everything in the game can be done with the mouse other than the button to show all the interactive objects on the screen
great point and click game only downside to it in my opinion was being stuck playing david in some chapters those parts we kinda annoying
not a perfect game but with a compelling story good music and well composed visuals it won me over
a great storydriven adventure game with some interesting puzzles and mostly pretty good voice acting definitely recommended for adventure gamers looking for something a little different
jane jensen is just wonderful there are a few bugs and weird puzzles but its every bit as beautiful as any gabriel knight game solid gold

a really enjoyable older game  point and click  i had this game in the original box form but it would not play anymore in my  updated computer so i bought it off of steam  just played it again after a few years and still enjoyed it  the sound track is wonderful  the story line and the puzzles really keep you interested  good length of play time  definately recommend it
